001package org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy;
002
003
004import org.jfree.chart.internal.Args;
005import java.io.Serializable;
006
007public class XYBarRendererProduct3 implements Serializable, Cloneable {
008        private double base;
009        private boolean useYInterval;
010        private double margin;
011        private XYBarPainter barPainter;
012        private boolean shadowsVisible;
013        private double barAlignmentFactor;
014
015        public double getBase() {
016                return base;
017        }
018
019        public void setBase2(double base) {
020                this.base = base;
021        }
022
023        public boolean getUseYInterval() {
024                return useYInterval;
025        }
026
027        public void setUseYInterval2(boolean useYInterval) {
028                this.useYInterval = useYInterval;
029        }
030
031        public double getMargin() {
032                return margin;
033        }
034
035        public void setMargin2(double margin) {
036                this.margin = margin;
037        }
038
039        public XYBarPainter getBarPainter() {
040                return barPainter;
041        }
042
043        public void setBarPainter2(XYBarPainter barPainter) {
044                this.barPainter = barPainter;
045        }
046
047        public boolean getShadowsVisible() {
048                return shadowsVisible;
049        }
050
051        public void setShadowsVisible(boolean shadowsVisible) {
052                this.shadowsVisible = shadowsVisible;
053        }
054
055        public double getBarAlignmentFactor() {
056                return barAlignmentFactor;
057        }
058
059        public void setBarAlignmentFactor2(double barAlignmentFactor) {
060                this.barAlignmentFactor = barAlignmentFactor;
061        }
062
063        /**
064        * Sets the base value for the bars and sends a  {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.  The base value is not used if the dataset's y-interval is being used to determine the bar length.
065        * @param base   the new base value.
066        * @see #getBase()
067        * @see #getUseYInterval()
068        */
069        public void setBase(double base, XYBarRenderer xYBarRenderer) {
070                this.base = base;
071                xYBarRenderer.fireChangeEvent();
072        }
073
074        /**
075        * Sets the flag that determines whether the y-interval from the dataset is used to calculate the length of each bar, and sends a {@link RendererChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
076        * @param use   the flag.
077        * @see #getUseYInterval()
078        */
079        public void setUseYInterval(boolean use, XYBarRenderer xYBarRenderer) {
080                if (this.useYInterval != use) {
081                        this.useYInterval = use;
082                        xYBarRenderer.fireChangeEvent();
083                }
084        }
085
086        /**
087        * Sets the percentage amount by which the bars are trimmed and sends a {@link RendererChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
088        * @param margin   the new margin.
089        * @see #getMargin()
090        */
091        public void setMargin(double margin, XYBarRenderer xYBarRenderer) {
092                this.margin = margin;
093                xYBarRenderer.fireChangeEvent();
094        }
095
096        /**
097        * Sets the bar painter and sends a  {@link RendererChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
098        * @param painter   the painter ( {@code  null}  not permitted).
099        */
100        public void setBarPainter(XYBarPainter painter, XYBarRenderer xYBarRenderer) {
101                Args.nullNotPermitted(painter, "painter");
102                this.barPainter = painter;
103                xYBarRenderer.fireChangeEvent();
104        }
105
106        /**
107        * Sets the flag that controls whether or not the renderer draws shadows for the bars, and sends a {@link RendererChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
108        * @param visible   the new flag value.
109        */
110        public void setShadowVisible(boolean visible, XYBarRenderer xYBarRenderer) {
111                this.shadowsVisible = visible;
112                xYBarRenderer.fireChangeEvent();
113        }
114
115        /**
116        * Sets the bar alignment factor and sends a  {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.  If the alignment factor is outside the range 0.0 to 1.0, no alignment will be performed by the renderer.
117        * @param factor   the factor.
118        */
119        public void setBarAlignmentFactor(double factor, XYBarRenderer xYBarRenderer) {
120                this.barAlignmentFactor = factor;
121                xYBarRenderer.fireChangeEvent();
122        }
123
124        public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
125                return (XYBarRendererProduct3) super.clone();
126        }
127}
